lines.text: I just can't help it, I have this uncontrollable urge to eat meat. Red... raw... meat.
The water! He's afraid of the water!

[finding a human skeleton]
Radek ate him!
Rick, if there's no way out, use that gun on Louise.

[about the mutant]
Man created him and God destroyed him, He brought the rain and the clean air.
Sometimes I have a feeling of doom.
All I know is there are two forms of life fighting for survival here in this valley, and only one of them can win. It's got to be us!

[Prologue]
What you are about to see may never happen... but to this anxious age in which we live, it presents a fearsome warning... Our story begins with... THE END!

[after putting on Jim's clothes]
You got pretty good taste in sports shirts, mister!

[Looking at the still moist bones of a rabbit]
Do you think he ate that?
Forty-nine roentens. Do you think a man could eat that poisonous meat and live?
No human being could eat that poisonous meat and live!
THere might be an entirely new set of laws, Jim, that we know nothing about.
